message: Let's start fair, I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent chunk.
Alice, that's not even close to fair.  I'm willing to be generous, but I'm taking the larger share this time.
Okay, let's try to be more reasonable. I'm willing to split it closer to 55/45, but we need to reach an agreement this time.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Take the 40% before inflation eats away even more of your share!
